dmca.title: Video DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Twitter
dmca.body:
[redacted], Jun-26 01:21 pm (PDT):

I am a person authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive
right that is allegedly infringed.

Authorized DMCA Agent:
[redacted]
[redacted].
Canoga Park, CA
91304
[redacted]
[redacted]takedownpiracy.com

The following works are copyrighted works of Blue Underground and a 
representative list of these works is as follows:
Term: Daughters Of Darkness
Term: Let Sleeping Corpses Lie
Term: Manhattan Baby
Term: Salon Kitty

Infringing status updates:
http://twitter.com/1shumisti/status/84896161332346880
http://twitter.com/20chelseenazar/status/84896138959912960
http://twitter.com/2muravelor/status/84921636096180224
http://twitter.com/dmitriekevia/status/84896002691182592
http://twitter.com/nicklezob/status/84192923507363840
http://twitter.com/polya1976lyn/status/84921656056885248
http://twitter.com/ryab15tor/status/84920885483540480
http://twitter.com/vijaypawase/status/84482385143529473

I have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner
complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agents, or
the law.

The information in the notice is accurate, under penalty of perjury.
-- 

[redacted]
Authorized DMCA Agent
